title: Driver for google phone pixel 3a on windows 8.1
content:
hello,

I need the driver for the google 3a .

Currently , when a connect my Google 3a phone on a Windows 8.1 desktop , in can not access the file using "file transfer  / Android auto " mode.
Only "PTP" mode is working  for photos or video , but i need to store some *.pdf files on the phone.

I have try to install ADB driver . Installation worked OK but the phone is not accessible in "File transfert" mode.

When i connect it , in the device manager i see it as Google 3a in "mobile devices" section of device manager for a short while  , but a few seconds after it is then moved in the "other peripheral" section as "unknow peripheral"  with a warning icon indicating it is not installed correctly.

Can someone help please?

Best regards.
